pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CriticusA suite of tools for transcribing, collating and and creating an apparatus criticus.## installRequires Python 3.8+### Windows: - `pip install criticus`- `python -m criticus`### MacOS: - `pip3 install criticus`- `python3 -m criticus`Read the full [tutorial on GitHub](https://github.com/d-flood/criticus).
